name: Fluffy Vegan Banana Pancakes
description: Wondrously Fluffy Vegan Banana Pancakes, incredibly easy to make with a mashed banana and a handful of pantry staples! Made in 1 bowl.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup mashed banana (| about 1 medium banana)
1 1/2 cups flour (| white, whole wheat pastry or white whole wheat)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, mash the banana. Use a measuring cup to make sure you have about 1/2 cup mashed banana.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium bowl, mash the banana. Use a measuring cup to make sure you have about 1/2 cup mashed banana.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the soy milk, oil, sugar and vanilla. Whisk until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the soy milk, oil, sugar and vanilla. Whisk until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour to the wet ingredients, then sprinkle the baking powder, salt and cinnamon (if using) on top of the flour. Mix until just combined with a wooden spoon. The batter will be lumpy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour to the wet ingredients, then sprinkle the baking powder, salt and cinnamon (if using) on top of the flour. Mix until just combined with a wooden spoon. The batter will be lumpy.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large griddle or pan over medium-high heat. Drop about 1/3 cup of the batter onto the griddle. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown on the other side, about 1-2 minutes. Repeat with all the remaining batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with vegan butter, pure maple syrup and more sliced bananas. These pancakes freeze well, and the recipe can be easily double, tripled or quadrupled.
